details:
[14-Apr-2025 14:30:56 UTC] WordPress database error

SELECT id,date_format(startTime,'%Y-%m-%d') as startTime,date_format(endTime,'%Y-%m-%d') as endTime,cssFile,repeatYearly FROM wp_scheduledstyles WHERE status='active' AND now() BETWEEN startTime AND endTime ORDER BY startTime;
